summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 BUICK REGAL. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 45 MPH, THE VEHICLE STALLED.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALER FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING WHERE THE DEALER STATED THAT THE IGNITION SWITCH HAD A HIGH RESISTANCE TO DRIVING ABILITY AND WOULD NEED REPLACING. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 45,158.   UPDATED 8/28/14*CN    UPDATED  11/28/2014   *JS
